prompts: Create a cute, round Pokemon that loves to sing and is primarily pink.
Imagine a fairy-type creature with big, expressive eyes and a playful demeanor.
Design a tiny Pokemon with a soft body shape and a calming presence.
Show me a whimsical Pokemon that floats and has a small tuft of hair on top.
Make a Pokemon that embodies joy and happiness, featuring bright pink colors.
Generate a fluffy creature that resides in tranquil forest areas, known for its soothing voice.
Give me a playful design of a small Pokemon that loves to cuddle and entertain.

distinctive_features: Small tuft on top of the head
